name: assignment_group_created
definition: The event is emitted anytime a new assignment group is created by an end user or API request.
trigger: Triggered when a new assignment group is created in a course.

schema.assignment_group_id: The Canvas id of the new assignment group.
schema.context_id: The Canvas context id of the new assignment group.
schema.context_type: The context type of the new assignment group.
schema.group_weight: The group weight of the new assignment group.
schema.integration_data: Integration data for the new assignment group.
schema.name: The name of the new assignment group.
schema.position: The position of the new assignment group on the assignments page.
schema.rules: Rules for the new assignment group.
schema.sis_source_id: The SIS source id of the new assignment group.
schema.workflow_state: Workflow state of the assignment group.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
